review_text: A very nice place of worship. It is a top of a hill with decent view. The church was at the top and it also has a very beautiful chapel midway right beside the main building. The chapel is full of relics. Very nice and solemn.

Chapel of Holy Relics.

Home of the famous Catholic Saints from around the world. ‚Ä¶

This place has church on top the hill, a chapel of different relics, has souvenirs store, the mass very solemn and you can focus on your prayer...on the top of the hill the statue of St.Rita de Cascia was there.
There's a big change, and in a good way.. My sister loved going back here..

You can ask the impossible, and it will happen. 100% Guaranteed!

A good place to meditate during Holy Week because of its ambience. I may be bias in this because of being a former OAD seminarian but I can attest that when I brought my friends, they all loved it.

After the mass we entered the chapel, its full of holy relics. Great place for pilgrims and anyone who wants to have a some sort of reflection and contemplation.
